name: Defense Factory
description:
Our VR Tower Defense game, Defense Factory.

This game was made for the VR Monthly Game Jam on itch.io, sponsored by the VR/AR association Philly.

Place down turrets to defend yourself against the onslaught of the red cube monsters! The game is surprisingly fun given it was built quickly for a game jam.

  • Upgrade guns for faster reloads
  • Build more factories for upgrades - cubes give you range, spheres give you splash damage.
  • Multiple enemy types
  • Multiple levels
  • Multiple difficulty settings

Game by: JP, Cédric and Claire.
